comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you pennylricharsca for pointing to a record in our own Harris & Ewing collection to verify the name of the congressman. We'll fill in his name and dates the next time we update this record. Here's another image from the same collection: www.loc.gov/pictures/item/hec2008004715/
